rptrMgmtName.name: rptrMgmtName
rptrMgmtName.description: The ASCII name assigned to this network.

rptrMgmtPortCount.name: rptrMgmtPortCount
rptrMgmtPortCount.description: Total number of ports residing on this lan segment.

rptrMgmtPortsEnable.name: rptrMgmtPortsEnable
rptrMgmtPortsEnable.description: Setting this object to Enable will cause all the ports residing in this network segment to be enabled. Setting this object to noEnable will have no effect. When read this object will always return noEnable.

rptrMgmtPortsOn.name: rptrMgmtPortsOn
rptrMgmtPortsOn.description: Get the total number of ON ports in this network.

rptrMgmtPortsOper.name: rptrMgmtPortsOper
rptrMgmtPortsOper.description: Get the number of operational ports in this network.

rptrMgmtBoardMap.name: rptrMgmtBoardMap
rptrMgmtBoardMap.description: Get a map of the chassis slots occupied by the boards in this network.

rptrMgmtInterfaceNum.name: rptrMgmtInterfaceNum
rptrMgmtInterfaceNum.description: Get the MIBII interface number of this network. A return of zero will mean this network is not associated with a MIBII interface.

rptrMgmtResetCounters.name: rptrMgmtResetCounters
rptrMgmtResetCounters.description: Setting this OID to 2 will reset the 'rptrPktStats', 'rptrProtocols' and 'rptrFrameSizes' RREV-4 branch static counters. Reading this OID will always return a 1.

rptrPktStatsPackets.name: rptrPktStatsPackets
rptrPktStatsPackets.description: Get this repeater's total received packets.

rptrPktStatsBytes.name: rptrPktStatsBytes
rptrPktStatsBytes.description: Get this repeater's total received bytes.

rptrPktStatsAlign.name: rptrPktStatsAlign
rptrPktStatsAlign.description: Get this repeater's total frame alignment errors.

rptrPktStatsCRC.name: rptrPktStatsCRC
rptrPktStatsCRC.description: Get this repeater's total CRC errors.

rptrPktStatsOOW.name: rptrPktStatsOOW
rptrPktStatsOOW.description: Get this repeater's total out-of-window collisions.

rptrPktStatsNoRsc.name: rptrPktStatsNoRsc
rptrPktStatsNoRsc.description: This counter is the number of packets on this network that the hardware has processed that the management has either not seen yet, in the case of an active network, or has missed missed all together, in the case of a once active network.

rptrPktStatsBroadcasts.name: rptrPktStatsBroadcasts
rptrPktStatsBroadcasts.description: This counter is the number of broadcast packets on this network that the hardware has processed.

rptrPktStatsMulticasts.name: rptrPktStatsMulticasts
rptrPktStatsMulticasts.description: This counter is the number of multicast packets on this network that the hardware has processed.

rptrProtocolsOSI.name: rptrProtocolsOSI
rptrProtocolsOSI.description: Get this repeater's total received OSI packets.

rptrProtocolsNovell.name: rptrProtocolsNovell
rptrProtocolsNovell.description: Get this repeater's total received Novell packets.

rptrProtocolsBanyan.name: rptrProtocolsBanyan
rptrProtocolsBanyan.description: Get this repeater's total received Banyan packets.

rptrProtocolsDECNet.name: rptrProtocolsDECNet
rptrProtocolsDECNet.description: Get this repeater's total received DECNet packets.

rptrProtocolsXNS.name: rptrProtocolsXNS
rptrProtocolsXNS.description: Get this repeater's total received XNS packets.

rptrProtocolsIP.name: rptrProtocolsIP
rptrProtocolsIP.description: Get this repeater's total received TCP/IP packets.

rptrProtocolsCtron.name: rptrProtocolsCtron
rptrProtocolsCtron.description: Get this repeater's total received CTRON Management packets.

rptrProtocolsAppletalk.name: rptrProtocolsAppletalk
rptrProtocolsAppletalk.description: Get this repeater's total received Appletalk packets.

rptrProtocolsOther.name: rptrProtocolsOther
rptrProtocolsOther.description: Get this repeater's total received unknown protocol packets.

rptrFrameSzRunt.name: rptrFrameSzRunt
rptrFrameSzRunt.description: Get this repeater's total received packets of size less than 64 bytes.

rptrFrameSz64To127.name: rptrFrameSz64To127
rptrFrameSz64To127.description: Get this repeater's total received packets of size between 64 and 127 bytes.

rptrFrameSz128To255.name: rptrFrameSz128To255
rptrFrameSz128To255.description: Get this repeater's total received packets of size between 128 and 255 bytes.

rptrFrameSz256To511.name: rptrFrameSz256To511
rptrFrameSz256To511.description: Get this repeater's total received packets of size between 256 and 511 bytes.

rptrFrameSz512To1023.name: rptrFrameSz512To1023
rptrFrameSz512To1023.description: Get this repeater's total received packets of size between 512 and 1023 bytes.

rptrFrameSz1024To1518.name: rptrFrameSz1024To1518
rptrFrameSz1024To1518.description: Get this repeater's total received packets of size between 1024 and 1518 bytes.

rptrFrameSzGiant.name: rptrFrameSzGiant
rptrFrameSzGiant.description: Get this repeater's total received packets of size greater than 1518 bytes.

rptrAlarmsTrafEnable.name: rptrAlarmsTrafEnable
rptrAlarmsTrafEnable.description: Get returns whether traffic alarms are enabled/disabled. Set allows for enabling/disabling of traffic alarms.

rptrAlarmsTrafThreshold.name: rptrAlarmsTrafThreshold
rptrAlarmsTrafThreshold.description: The maximum number of packets that will be allowed before an alarm is generated.

rptrAlarmsCollEnable.name: rptrAlarmsCollEnable
rptrAlarmsCollEnable.description: Get returns whether collision alarms are enabled/disabled. Set allows for enabling/disabling of collision alarms.

rptrAlarmsCollThreshold.name: rptrAlarmsCollThreshold
rptrAlarmsCollThreshold.description: The collision threshold is the maximum number of collisions within the time base that will be allowed before an alarm is generated.

rptrAlarmsErrEnable.name: rptrAlarmsErrEnable
rptrAlarmsErrEnable.description: Get returns whether error alarms are enabled/disabled. Set allows for enabling/disabling of error alarms.

rptrAlarmsErrThreshold.name: rptrAlarmsErrThreshold
rptrAlarmsErrThreshold.description: The percentage of errors per good packet within the timebase that will cause an alarm. The units of this value is in seconds.

rptrAlarmsErrSource.name: rptrAlarmsErrSource
rptrAlarmsErrSource.description: Get/Set a bit encoded map of which errors to include in the error sum, as follows: CRC_errors - Bit 0 - Least Significant Bit runts - Bit 1 OOW_colls - Bit 2 align_errs - Bit 3 undefined - Bit 4 Giants - Bit 5

rptrAlarmsBroadEnable.name: rptrAlarmsBroadEnable
rptrAlarmsBroadEnable.description: Get returns whether broadcast alarms are enabled/disabled. Set allows for enabling/disabling of broadcast alarms.

rptrAlarmsBroadThreshold.name: rptrAlarmsBroadThreshold
rptrAlarmsBroadThreshold.description: The broadcase threshold represents the maximum number of broadcasts that are allowed during the time base before an alarm is generated.

rptrRedundReset.name: rptrRedundReset
rptrRedundReset.description: If this object is set to Reset it will cause a reset of the redundancy object to occur. Setting this object to NoReset will do nothing. This object will always be read as NoReset.

rptrRedundPollInterval.name: rptrRedundPollInterval
rptrRedundPollInterval.description: Get/Set the number of seconds between polls for redundancy.

rptrRedundTestTOD.name: rptrRedundTestTOD
rptrRedundTestTOD.description: Get/Set the time of day at which the redundant circuits will be tested. The format of the time string is hh:mm:ss.

rptrRedundPerformTest.name: rptrRedundPerformTest
rptrRedundPerformTest.description: If this object is set to Test it will cause a test of the redundant circuits to be performed. Setting this object to NoTest will have no effect. When read this object will always return NoTest.

rptrRedundMaxCrcts.name: rptrRedundMaxCrcts
rptrRedundMaxCrcts.description: Returns the maximum number of circuits which may exist on this network.

rptrRedundCrctTable.name: rptrRedundCrctTable
rptrRedundCrctTable.description: A list of redundant circuit objects for this repeater.

rptrRedundCrctEntry.name: rptrRedundCrctEntry
rptrRedundCrctEntry.description: A list of objects for a particular redundant circuit.

rptrRedundCrctId.name: rptrRedundCrctId
rptrRedundCrctId.description: Returns the index for a member circuit in the table of redundant circuits.

rptrRedundCrctName.name: rptrRedundCrctName
rptrRedundCrctName.description: Get/Set the name of the indicated circuit.

rptrRedundCrctRetrys.name: rptrRedundCrctRetrys
rptrRedundCrctRetrys.description: Get/Set the the number of unanswered polls allowed for the circuit.

rptrRedundCrctNumBPs.name: rptrRedundCrctNumBPs
rptrRedundCrctNumBPs.description: Get the number of board/port combinations associated with the circuit.

rptrRedundCrctNumAddr.name: rptrRedundCrctNumAddr
rptrRedundCrctNumAddr.description: Get the number of IP Addresses associated with the circuit.

rptrRedundCrctAddAddr.name: rptrRedundCrctAddAddr
rptrRedundCrctAddAddr.description: Add an IP Address to the polling list for the indicated circuit.

rptrRedundCrctDelAddr.name: rptrRedundCrctDelAddr
rptrRedundCrctDelAddr.description: Delete an IP Address from the polling list of the indicated circuit.

rptrRedundCrctEnable.name: rptrRedundCrctEnable
rptrRedundCrctEnable.description: If this object is set to Enable, the circuit is enabled. If this object is set to Disable, the circuit is disbabled. When read, this object returns the state of the object based on the last request made.

rptrRedundCrctReset.name: rptrRedundCrctReset
rptrRedundCrctReset.description: If this object is set to Reset, the circuit is reset. All of the circuit's associated boards and ports are returned to NOT_USED, any associated IP Addresses are purged from the circuit's address list, the name is cleared, and the retry count is reset to a default value. Setting this object to NoReset has no effect. When read, NoReset is always returned.

rptrRedundPortTable.name: rptrRedundPortTable
rptrRedundPortTable.description: A list of redundant port objects for this repeater.

rptrRedundPortEntry.name: rptrRedundPortEntry
rptrRedundPortEntry.description: A redundant port entry containing objects pertaining to a particular redundant port.

rptrRedundPortId.name: rptrRedundPortId
rptrRedundPortId.description: A unique value identifying an element in a sequence of member ports which belong to a circuit in the table of redundant circuits. This value is not a port number; rather it is a value which goes from 1 to the maximum number of ports which may be included in a redundant circuit.

rptrRedundPortCrctId.name: rptrRedundPortCrctId
rptrRedundPortCrctId.description: A unique value identifying a member circuit in the table of redundant circuits. This value is similar to rptrRedundCrctId.

rptrRedundPortNum.name: rptrRedundPortNum
rptrRedundPortNum.description: Returns the port number of a member port belonging to a redundant circuit.

rptrRedundPortBoardNum.name: rptrRedundPortBoardNum
rptrRedundPortBoardNum.description: Returns the board number of a member port belonging to a redundant circuit.

rptrRedundPortType.name: rptrRedundPortType
rptrRedundPortType.description: Return the state of a port associated with the indicated circuit.

rptrRedundAddrTable.name: rptrRedundAddrTable
rptrRedundAddrTable.description: A list of redundant IP Address objects which belong to a circuit for this repeater.

rptrRedundAddrEntry.name: rptrRedundAddrEntry
rptrRedundAddrEntry.description: A entry containing objects pertaining to a particular redundant IP Address which belongs to a circuit.

rptrRedundAddrId.name: rptrRedundAddrId
rptrRedundAddrId.description: A unique value identifying an element in a sequence of member IP Addresses which belong to a circuit in the table of redundant circuits. This value goes from 1 to the maximum number of IP Addresses which may be included in a redundant circuit.

rptrRedundAddrCrctId.name: rptrRedundAddrCrctId
rptrRedundAddrCrctId.description: A unique value identifying a member circuit in the table of redundant circuits. This value is similar to rptrRedundCrctId.

rptrRedundAddrIPAddr.name: rptrRedundAddrIPAddr
rptrRedundAddrIPAddr.description: Returns an IP Address associated with the indicated circuit.

rptrSrcAddrListTable.name: rptrSrcAddrListTable
rptrSrcAddrListTable.description: This table defines the source address list that is defined at the repeater level.

rptrSrcAddrListEntry.name: rptrSrcAddrListEntry
rptrSrcAddrListEntry.description: Defines a specific source address object.

rptrSrcAddrListId.name: rptrSrcAddrListId
rptrSrcAddrListId.description: Returns an index into a table of source address seen by this repeater.

rptrSrcAddrAddressList.name: rptrSrcAddrAddressList
rptrSrcAddrAddressList.description: Returns a source address seen by this repeater.

rptrSrcAddrSrcTable.name: rptrSrcAddrSrcTable
rptrSrcAddrSrcTable.description: This table defines the list of all source addresses that have been seen.

rptrSrcAddrSrcTableEntry.name: rptrSrcAddrSrcTableEntry
rptrSrcAddrSrcTableEntry.description: Describes a particular source address source entry.

rptrSrcAddrSrcTableEntryId.name: rptrSrcAddrSrcTableEntryId
rptrSrcAddrSrcTableEntryId.description: Returns the source address to which this table's information pertains.

rptrSrcAddrSrcTableEntryPort.name: rptrSrcAddrSrcTableEntryPort
rptrSrcAddrSrcTableEntryPort.description: Returns the port# of the port that sourced the source address.

rptrSrcAddrSrcTableEntryPortGroup.name: rptrSrcAddrSrcTableEntryPortGroup
rptrSrcAddrSrcTableEntryPortGroup.description: Returns the port group# of the port that sourced the source address.

rptrSrcAddrMgmtPortLock.name: rptrSrcAddrMgmtPortLock
rptrSrcAddrMgmtPortLock.description: Setting this object to Lock will activate the network port security lock. Setting a value of portMisMatch(3) is invalid. A value of portMisMatch(3) reflects that not all ports are at the same value.

rptrSrcAddrMgmtActiveUsers.name: rptrSrcAddrMgmtActiveUsers
rptrSrcAddrMgmtActiveUsers.description: Get the number of active users on this network.

rptrSrcAddrMgmtHashType.name: rptrSrcAddrMgmtHashType
rptrSrcAddrMgmtHashType.description: Defines the type of hashing that will be used for source address management. In a DEC-NET environment or a combination fo DEC-NET and non DEC-NET users where source address hash access is a concern a value of decHash(2) may yield better results. For non DEC-NET users a value of noDecHash(1) is preferred.

rptrHwTrapSetLink.name: rptrHwTrapSetLink
rptrHwTrapSetLink.description: Enables and disables link traps for this network. Setting a value of disable(1) is equivalent to setting all instances of rptrPortHwTrapSetLink to a value of disable(1). Setting a value of enable(2) is equivalent to setting all instances of rptrPortHwTrapSetLink to a value of disable(2). Setting a value of other(3) is not allowed. This object will read with the value of disable(1) if all instances of rptrPortHwTrapSetLink for this network are currently set to a value of disable(1). This object will read with the value of enable(2) if all instances of rptrPortHwTrapSetLink for this network are currently set to a value of enable(2). This object will read with the value of other(3) if all instances of rptrPortHwTrapSetLink for this network are not currently set to a value the same value.

rptrHwTrapSetSeg.name: rptrHwTrapSetSeg
rptrHwTrapSetSeg.description: Enables and disables segmentation traps for this network. Setting a value of disable(1) is equivalent to setting all instances of rptrPortHwTrapSetSeg to a value of disable(1). Setting a value of enable(2) is equivalent to setting all instances of rptrPortHwTrapSetSeg to a value of disable(2). Setting a value of other(3) is not allowed. This object will read with the value of disable(1) if all instances of rptrPortHwTrapSetSeg for this network are currently set to a value of disable(1). This object will read with the value of enable(2) if all instances of rptrPortHwTrapSetSeg for this network are currently set to a value of enable(2). This object will read with the value of other(3) if all instances of rptrPortHwTrapSetSeg for this network are not currently set to a value the same value.

rptrSaTrapSetSrcaddr.name: rptrSaTrapSetSrcaddr
rptrSaTrapSetSrcaddr.description: Enables and disables source address traps for this network. Setting a value of disable(1) is equivalent to setting all instances of rptrPortSaTrapSetSrcaddr to a value of disable(1). Setting a value of enable(2) is equivalent to setting all instances of rptrPortSaTrapSetSrcaddr to a value of disable(2). Setting a value of other(3) is not allowed. This object will read with the value of disable(1) if all instances of rptrPortSaTrapSetSrcaddr for this network are currently set to a value of disable(1). This object will read with the value of enable(2) if all instances of rptrPortSaTrapSetSrcaddr for this network are currently set to a value of enable(2). This object will read with the value of other(3) if all instances of rptrPortSaTrapSetSrcaddr for this network are not currently set to a value the same value.

rptrSecurityLockState.name: rptrSecurityLockState
rptrSecurityLockState.description: Setting this object to Lock will activate the network port security lock. Setting a value of portMisMatch(3) is invalid. A value of portMisMatch(3) reflects that not all ports are at the same value.

rptrSecuritySecureState.name: rptrSecuritySecureState
rptrSecuritySecureState.description: The status of source address security of the network. Ports on the network that are secure(1), can be locked in order to enable security. nonSecure(2) ports cannot be locked. Setting a value of portMisMatch(3) is invalid. A value of portMisMatch(3) reflects that not all ports are at the same value.

rptrSecurityLearnState.name: rptrSecurityLearnState
rptrSecurityLearnState.description: The learn state of the network. This object will only be applied to ports that are unlocked. If set to learn(1), all addresses are deleted on the ports and learning begins once again. If it is set to noLearn(2), learning stops on the port. Setting a value of portMisMatch(3) is invalid. A value of portMisMatch(3) reflects that not all ports are at the same value.

rptrSecurityLearnMode.name: rptrSecurityLearnMode
rptrSecurityLearnMode.description: Get/Set the learn mode of the network. If set to onetime learn mode oneTime(1), each port is capable of learning two addresses and securing on both destination and source addresses once they are locked. If set to continuous learn continuous(2), all addresses are initially deleted and each port continuously replaces the existing secure source address with the latest source address it sees. Setting a value of portMisMatch(3) is invalid. A value of portMisMatch(3) reflects that not all ports are at the same value.

rptrPortGrpMgmtTable.name: rptrPortGrpMgmtTable
rptrPortGrpMgmtTable.description: A list of port management objects for this repeater node.

rptrPortGrpMgmtEntry.name: rptrPortGrpMgmtEntry
rptrPortGrpMgmtEntry.description: An entry containing objects pertaining to port management for a port group.

rptrPortGrpMgmtGrpId.name: rptrPortGrpMgmtGrpId
rptrPortGrpMgmtGrpId.description: Returns an index to a port group for which the information in this table pertains.

rptrPortGrpMgmtName.name: rptrPortGrpMgmtName
rptrPortGrpMgmtName.description: Gets/Sets a name for the specified port group.

rptrPortGrpMgmtPortCount.name: rptrPortGrpMgmtPortCount
rptrPortGrpMgmtPortCount.description: Get total number of ports contained on the board. Notice that this is the physical port count.

rptrPortGrpMgmtPortsEnable.name: rptrPortGrpMgmtPortsEnable
rptrPortGrpMgmtPortsEnable.description: Setting this object to Enable will cause all the ports residing in this network segment to be enabled. Setting this object to noEnable will have no effect. When read this object will always return noEnable.

rptrPortGrpMgmtPortsOn.name: rptrPortGrpMgmtPortsOn
rptrPortGrpMgmtPortsOn.description: Get total number of ON ports in this port group.

rptrPortGrpMgmtPortsOper.name: rptrPortGrpMgmtPortsOper
rptrPortGrpMgmtPortsOper.description: Get total number of operational ports in the port group.

rptrPortGrpMgmtLogPortCount.name: rptrPortGrpMgmtLogPortCount
rptrPortGrpMgmtLogPortCount.description: Get total number of ports contained in this port group.

rptrPortGrpPktStatsTbl.name: rptrPortGrpPktStatsTbl
rptrPortGrpPktStatsTbl.description: This table provides packet statistics for port group.

rptrPortGrpPktStatsEntry.name: rptrPortGrpPktStatsEntry
rptrPortGrpPktStatsEntry.description: Defines a specific packet statistics entry.

rptrPortGrpPktStatsId.name: rptrPortGrpPktStatsId
rptrPortGrpPktStatsId.description: Returns an index to a port group for which the information in this table pertains.

rptrPortGrpPktStatsPkts.name: rptrPortGrpPktStatsPkts
rptrPortGrpPktStatsPkts.description: Return this port group's total received packets.

rptrPortGrpPktStatsBytes.name: rptrPortGrpPktStatsBytes
rptrPortGrpPktStatsBytes.description: Return this port group's total received bytes.

rptrPortGrpPktStatsColls.name: rptrPortGrpPktStatsColls
rptrPortGrpPktStatsColls.description: Return this port group's total collisions.

rptrPortGrpPktStatsErrors.name: rptrPortGrpPktStatsErrors
rptrPortGrpPktStatsErrors.description: Return this port group's total errors.

rptrPortGrpPktStatsAlign.name: rptrPortGrpPktStatsAlign
rptrPortGrpPktStatsAlign.description: Return this port group's total frame alignment errors.

rptrPortGrpPktStatsCRC.name: rptrPortGrpPktStatsCRC
rptrPortGrpPktStatsCRC.description: Return this port group's total CRC errors.

rptrPortGrpPktStatsOOW.name: rptrPortGrpPktStatsOOW
rptrPortGrpPktStatsOOW.description: Return this port group's total out-of-window collisions.

rptrPortGrpPktStatsBroadcasts.name: rptrPortGrpPktStatsBroadcasts
rptrPortGrpPktStatsBroadcasts.description: Return this port group's total received broadcast packets.

rptrPortGrpPktStatsMulticasts.name: rptrPortGrpPktStatsMulticasts
rptrPortGrpPktStatsMulticasts.description: Return this port group's total received multicast packets.

rptrPortGrpProtocolEntry.name: rptrPortGrpProtocolEntry
rptrPortGrpProtocolEntry.description: Defines a specific port group protocol statistics entry.

rptrPortGrpProtocolId.name: rptrPortGrpProtocolId
rptrPortGrpProtocolId.description: Returns an index to a port group for which the information in this table pertains.

rptrPortGrpProtocolOSI.name: rptrPortGrpProtocolOSI
rptrPortGrpProtocolOSI.description: Return this port group's total received OSI packets.

rptrPortGrpProtocolNovell.name: rptrPortGrpProtocolNovell
rptrPortGrpProtocolNovell.description: Return this port group's total received Novell packets.

rptrPortGrpProtocolBanyan.name: rptrPortGrpProtocolBanyan
rptrPortGrpProtocolBanyan.description: Return this port group's total received Banyan packets.

rptrPortGrpProtocolDECNet.name: rptrPortGrpProtocolDECNet
rptrPortGrpProtocolDECNet.description: Return this port group's total received DECNet packets.

rptrPortGrpProtocolXNS.name: rptrPortGrpProtocolXNS
rptrPortGrpProtocolXNS.description: Return this port group's total received XNS packets.

rptrPortGrpProtocolIP.name: rptrPortGrpProtocolIP
rptrPortGrpProtocolIP.description: Return this port group's total received TCP/IP packets.

rptrPortGrpProtocolCtron.name: rptrPortGrpProtocolCtron
rptrPortGrpProtocolCtron.description: Return this port group's total received CTRON Management packets.

rptrPortGrpProtocolAppletalk.name: rptrPortGrpProtocolAppletalk
rptrPortGrpProtocolAppletalk.description: Return this port group's total received Appletalk packets.

rptrPortGrpProtocolOther.name: rptrPortGrpProtocolOther
rptrPortGrpProtocolOther.description: Return this port group's total received unknown protocol packets.

rptrPortGrpFrameSzTbl.name: rptrPortGrpFrameSzTbl
rptrPortGrpFrameSzTbl.description: Defines frame sizes as seen by this port group.

rptrPortGrpFrameSzEntry.name: rptrPortGrpFrameSzEntry
rptrPortGrpFrameSzEntry.description: Defines a particular frame size entry.

rptrPortGrpFrameSzId.name: rptrPortGrpFrameSzId
rptrPortGrpFrameSzId.description: Returns an index to a port group for which the information in this table pertains.

rptrPortGrpFrameSzRunt.name: rptrPortGrpFrameSzRunt
rptrPortGrpFrameSzRunt.description: Return this port group's total received packets of size less than 64 bytes.

rptrPortGrpFrameSz64To127.name: rptrPortGrpFrameSz64To127
rptrPortGrpFrameSz64To127.description: Return this port group's total received packets of size between 64 and 127 bytes.

rptrPortGrpFrameSz128To255.name: rptrPortGrpFrameSz128To255
rptrPortGrpFrameSz128To255.description: Return this port group's total received packets of size between 128 and 255 bytes.

rptrPortGrpFrameSz256To511.name: rptrPortGrpFrameSz256To511
rptrPortGrpFrameSz256To511.description: Return this port group's total received packets of size between 256 and 511 bytes.

rptrPortGrpFrameSz512To1023.name: rptrPortGrpFrameSz512To1023
rptrPortGrpFrameSz512To1023.description: Return this port group's total received packets of size between 512 and 1023 bytes.

rptrPortGrpFrameSz1024To1518.name: rptrPortGrpFrameSz1024To1518
rptrPortGrpFrameSz1024To1518.description: Return this port group's total received packets of size between 1024 and 1518 bytes.

rptrPortGrpFrameSzGiant.name: rptrPortGrpFrameSzGiant
rptrPortGrpFrameSzGiant.description: Return this port group's total received packets of size greater than 1518 bytes.

rptrPortGrpAlarmTable.name: rptrPortGrpAlarmTable
rptrPortGrpAlarmTable.description: A list of port group alarm objects for this repeater node.

rptrPortGrpAlarmEntry.name: rptrPortGrpAlarmEntry
rptrPortGrpAlarmEntry.description: An entry containing objects pertaining to port group alarms for a port group.

rptrPortGrpAlarmId.name: rptrPortGrpAlarmId
rptrPortGrpAlarmId.description: Returns an index to a port group for which the information in this table pertains.

rptrPortGrpAlarmTrafEnable.name: rptrPortGrpAlarmTrafEnable
rptrPortGrpAlarmTrafEnable.description: Get returns whether traffic alarms are enabled/disabled. Set allows for enabling/disabling of traffic alarms.

rptrPortGrpAlarmTrafThreshold.name: rptrPortGrpAlarmTrafThreshold
rptrPortGrpAlarmTrafThreshold.description: The maximum number of packets that will be allowed before an alarm is generated.

rptrPortGrpAlarmTrafGrpDisable.name: rptrPortGrpAlarmTrafGrpDisable
rptrPortGrpAlarmTrafGrpDisable.description: Set will permit a port group to be disabled on a traffic alarm condition. Get will show whether the port group disabling is allowed or not.

rptrPortGrpAlarmCollEnable.name: rptrPortGrpAlarmCollEnable
rptrPortGrpAlarmCollEnable.description: Get returns whether collision alarms are enabled/disabled. Set allows for enabling/disabling of collision alarms.

rptrPortGrpAlarmCollThreshold.name: rptrPortGrpAlarmCollThreshold
rptrPortGrpAlarmCollThreshold.description: The collision threshold is the maximum number of collisions within the time base that will be allowed before an alaram is generated.

rptrPortGrpAlarmCollBdDisable.name: rptrPortGrpAlarmCollBdDisable
rptrPortGrpAlarmCollBdDisable.description: Set will permit a port group to be disabled on a collision alarm condition. Get will show whether the port group disabling is allowed or not.

rptrPortGrpAlarmErrEnable.name: rptrPortGrpAlarmErrEnable
rptrPortGrpAlarmErrEnable.description: Get returns whether error alarms are enabled/disabled. Set allows for enabling/disabling of error alarms.

rptrPortGrpAlarmErrThreshold.name: rptrPortGrpAlarmErrThreshold
rptrPortGrpAlarmErrThreshold.description: Get/Set the percentage of errors per good packet within the timebase that will cause an alarm.

rptrPortGrpAlarmErrSource.name: rptrPortGrpAlarmErrSource
rptrPortGrpAlarmErrSource.description: Get/Set a bit encoded map of which errors to include in the error sum, as follows: CRC_errors - Bit 0 - Least Significant Bit runts - Bit 1 OOW_colls - Bit 2 align_errs - Bit 3 undefined - Bit 4 Giants - Bit 5

rptrPortGrpAlarmErrGrpDisable.name: rptrPortGrpAlarmErrGrpDisable
rptrPortGrpAlarmErrGrpDisable.description: Set will permit a port group to be disabled on an error alarm condition. Get will show whether the port group disabling is allowed or not.

rptrPortGrpAlarmBroadEnable.name: rptrPortGrpAlarmBroadEnable
rptrPortGrpAlarmBroadEnable.description: Get returns whether broadcast alarms are enabled/disabled. Set allows for enabling/disabling of broadcast alarms.

rptrPortGrpAlarmBroadThreshold.name: rptrPortGrpAlarmBroadThreshold
rptrPortGrpAlarmBroadThreshold.description: The broadcase threshold represents the maximum number of broadcasts that are allowed during the time base before an alarm is generated.

rptrPortGrpAlarmBroadGrpDisable.name: rptrPortGrpAlarmBroadGrpDisable
rptrPortGrpAlarmBroadGrpDisable.description: Set will permit a port group to be disabled on a broadcast alarm condition. Get will show whether the port group disabling is allowed or not.

rptrPortGrpSrcAddrTable.name: rptrPortGrpSrcAddrTable
rptrPortGrpSrcAddrTable.description: This table provides a list of the number of active users that have been seen by port group.

rptrPortGrpSrcAddrEntry.name: rptrPortGrpSrcAddrEntry
rptrPortGrpSrcAddrEntry.description: Defines a specific active user entry.

rptrPortGrpSrcAddrId.name: rptrPortGrpSrcAddrId
rptrPortGrpSrcAddrId.description: Returns an index to a port group for which the information in this table pertains.

rptrPortGrpSrcAddrActiveUsers.name: rptrPortGrpSrcAddrActiveUsers
rptrPortGrpSrcAddrActiveUsers.description: Returns the total number of active users seen by this port group.

rptrPortGrpHwTrapTable.name: rptrPortGrpHwTrapTable
rptrPortGrpHwTrapTable.description: A list of trap enable/disable at the port group level. Disable here is equivalent to disable for each port in the port group.

rptrPortGrpHwTrapEntry.name: rptrPortGrpHwTrapEntry
rptrPortGrpHwTrapEntry.description: Individual trap entries for port group enable/disable.

rptrPortGrpHwTrapSetGrpId.name: rptrPortGrpHwTrapSetGrpId
rptrPortGrpHwTrapSetGrpId.description: Returns an index to a port group for which the information in this table pertains.

rptrPortGrpHwTrapSetLink.name: rptrPortGrpHwTrapSetLink
rptrPortGrpHwTrapSetLink.description: Enables and disables link traps for the specified port group. Setting a value of disable(1) is equivalent to setting all instances of rptrPortHwTrapSetLink to a value of disable(1). Setting a value of enable(2) is equivalent to setting all instances of rptrPortHwTrapSetLink to a value of disable(2). Setting a value of other(3) is not allowed. This object will read with the value of disable(1) if all instances of rptrPortHwTrapSetLink for this port group are currently set to a value of disable(1). This object will read with the value of enable(2) if all instances of rptrPortHwTrapSetLink for this port group are currently set to a value of enable(2). This object will read with the value of other(3) if all instances of rptrPortHwTrapSetLink for this port group are not currently set to a value the same value.

rptrPortGrpHwTrapSetSeg.name: rptrPortGrpHwTrapSetSeg
rptrPortGrpHwTrapSetSeg.description: Enables and disables segmentation traps for the specified port group. Setting a value of disable(1) is equivalent to setting all instances of rptrPortHwTrapSetSeg to a value of disable(1). Setting a value of enable(2) is equivalent to setting all instances of rptrPortHwTrapSetSeg to a value of disable(2). Setting a value of other(3) is not allowed. This object will read with the value of disable(1) if all instances of rptrPortHwTrapSetSeg for this port group are currently set to a value of disable(1). This object will read with the value of enable(2) if all instances of rptrPortHwTrapSetSeg for this port group are currently set to a value of enable(2). This object will read with the value of other(3) if all instances of rptrPortHwTrapSetSeg for this port group are not currently set to a value the same value.

rptrPortGrpSaTrapTable.name: rptrPortGrpSaTrapTable
rptrPortGrpSaTrapTable.description: A list of trap enable/disable at the port group level. Disable here is equivalent to disable for each port in the port group.

rptrPortGrpSaTrapEntry.name: rptrPortGrpSaTrapEntry
rptrPortGrpSaTrapEntry.description: Individual trap entries for port group enable/disable.

rptrPortGrpSaTrapSetGrpId.name: rptrPortGrpSaTrapSetGrpId
rptrPortGrpSaTrapSetGrpId.description: Returns an index to a port group for which the information in this table pertains.

rptrPortGrpSaTrapSetSrcaddr.name: rptrPortGrpSaTrapSetSrcaddr
rptrPortGrpSaTrapSetSrcaddr.description: Enables and disables source address traps for the specified port group. Setting a value of disable(1) is equivalent to setting all instances of rtprPortSaTrapSetSrcaddr to a value of disable(1). Setting a value of enable(2) is equivalent to setting all instances of rtprPortSaTrapSetSrcaddr to a value of disable(2). Setting a value of other(3) is not allowed. This object will read with the value of disable(1) if all instances of rptrPortSaTrapSetSrcaddr for this port group are currently set to a value of disable(1). This object will read with the value of enable(2) if all instances of rptrPortSaTrapSetSrcaddr for this port group are currently set to a value of enable(2). This object will read with the value of other(3) if all instances of rptrPortSaTrapSetSrcaddr for this port group are not currently set to a value the same value.

rptrPortGrpSrcAddrLockTable.name: rptrPortGrpSrcAddrLockTable
rptrPortGrpSrcAddrLockTable.description: This table defines the status of the port group source address security locks.

rptrPortGrpSrcAddrLockEntry.name: rptrPortGrpSrcAddrLockEntry
rptrPortGrpSrcAddrLockEntry.description: DeDefines a status of a particular port group security lock.

rptrPortGrpSrcAddrLockGrpId.name: rptrPortGrpSrcAddrLockGrpId
rptrPortGrpSrcAddrLockGrpId.description: Defines a particular port group for which this source address security lock information pertains.

rptrPortGrpSrcAddrLock.name: rptrPortGrpSrcAddrLock
rptrPortGrpSrcAddrLock.description: Allows setting of the security lock status for this port group. unlock(1) - Unlocks the source address lock this group, lock(2) - Locks the source address for this group, Setting a value of portMisMatch(3) is invalid. A value of portMisMatch(3) reflects that not all ports are at the same value.

rptrPortGrpSASecuritySecureState.name: rptrPortGrpSASecuritySecureState
rptrPortGrpSASecuritySecureState.description: The state of the source addressing security for this port group. Ports on the port group that are secure(1), can be locked in order to enable security. When a value of nonSecure(2) is returned ports cannot be locked. Setting a value of portMisMatch(3) is invalid. A value of portMisMatch(3) reflects that not all ports are at the same value.

rptrPortGrpSASecurityLearnState.name: rptrPortGrpSASecurityLearnState
rptrPortGrpSASecurityLearnState.description: The learn state of source addressing security for this port group. This object will only be applied to ports that are unlocked. If set to learn(1), all addresses are deleted on the port and learning begins once again. If it is set to noLearn(2), learning stops on the port. Setting a value of portMisMatch(3) is invalid. A value of portMisMatch(3) reflects that not all ports are at the same value.

rptrPortGrpSASecurityLearnMode.name: rptrPortGrpSASecurityLearnMode
rptrPortGrpSASecurityLearnMode.description: The learn mode of source addressing security port group. If set to oneTime(1), each port is capable of learning two addresses and securing on both destination and source addresses once they are locked. If set to continuous(2), all addresses are initially deleted and each port continuously replaces the existing secure source address with latest source address it sees. Setting a value of portMisMatch(3) is invalid. A value of portMisMatch(3) reflects that not all ports are at the same value.

rptrPortMgmtTable.name: rptrPortMgmtTable
rptrPortMgmtTable.description: A list of port management objects for this repeater node.

rptrPortMgmtEntry.name: rptrPortMgmtEntry
rptrPortMgmtEntry.description: An entry containing objects pertaining to port management for a port.

rptrPortMgmtPortId.name: rptrPortMgmtPortId
rptrPortMgmtPortId.description: Returns an index to a port for which the information in this table pertains.

rptrPortMgmtPortGrpId.name: rptrPortMgmtPortGrpId
rptrPortMgmtPortGrpId.description: Returns an index to a port group for which the information in this table pertains.

rptrPortMgmtName.name: rptrPortMgmtName
rptrPortMgmtName.description: Sets/Gets an ASCII name assigned to this port.

rptrPortMgmtAdminState.name: rptrPortMgmtAdminState
rptrPortMgmtAdminState.description: Setting this object to Enable will cause port to be enabled. Setting this object to Disable will cause the port to be disabled. When read this object will return the state of the object per the last request.

rptrPortMgmtPortType.name: rptrPortMgmtPortType
rptrPortMgmtPortType.description: Uniquely defines the repeater port type. A authoritative identification for a port type. By convention, this value is allocated within the SMI enterprises subtree (1.3.6.1.4.1), and provides an easy and unambiguous means to determine the type of repeater port.

rptrPortPktStatsEntry.name: rptrPortPktStatsEntry
rptrPortPktStatsEntry.description: Provides basic statistics for a specific port.

rptrPortPktStatsPortId.name: rptrPortPktStatsPortId
rptrPortPktStatsPortId.description: Returns an index to a port for which the information in this table pertains.

rptrPortPktStatsPortGrpId.name: rptrPortPktStatsPortGrpId
rptrPortPktStatsPortGrpId.description: Returns an index to a port group for which the information in this table pertains.

rptrPortPktStatsPackets.name: rptrPortPktStatsPackets
rptrPortPktStatsPackets.description: Get this port's total received packets.

rptrPortPktStatsBytes.name: rptrPortPktStatsBytes
rptrPortPktStatsBytes.description: Get this port's total received bytes.

rptrPortPktStatsAlign.name: rptrPortPktStatsAlign
rptrPortPktStatsAlign.description: Get this port's total frame alignment errors.

rptrPortPktStatsCRC.name: rptrPortPktStatsCRC
rptrPortPktStatsCRC.description: Get this port's total CRC errors.

rptrPortPktStatsOOW.name: rptrPortPktStatsOOW
rptrPortPktStatsOOW.description: Get this port's total out-of-window collisions.

rptrPortPktStatsBroadcasts.name: rptrPortPktStatsBroadcasts
rptrPortPktStatsBroadcasts.description: Get this port's total received broadcast packets.

rptrPortPktStatsMulticasts.name: rptrPortPktStatsMulticasts
rptrPortPktStatsMulticasts.description: Get this port's total received multicast packets.

rptrPortProtocolTbl.name: rptrPortProtocolTbl
rptrPortProtocolTbl.description: Provides statistics about the protocols seen by the different ports.

rptrPortProtocolEntry.name: rptrPortProtocolEntry
rptrPortProtocolEntry.description: An entry containing objects pertaining to statistics about protocols seen by different ports.

rptrPortProtocolPortId.name: rptrPortProtocolPortId
rptrPortProtocolPortId.description: Returns an index to a port for which the information in this table pertains.

rptrPortProtocolPortGrpId.name: rptrPortProtocolPortGrpId
rptrPortProtocolPortGrpId.description: Returns an index to a port group for which the information in this table pertains.

rptrPortProtocolOSI.name: rptrPortProtocolOSI
rptrPortProtocolOSI.description: Get this port's total received OSI protocol packets.

rptrPortProtocolNovell.name: rptrPortProtocolNovell
rptrPortProtocolNovell.description: Get this port's total received Novell protocol packets.

rptrPortProtocolBanyan.name: rptrPortProtocolBanyan
rptrPortProtocolBanyan.description: Get this port's total received Banyan protocol packets.

rptrPortProtocolDECNet.name: rptrPortProtocolDECNet
rptrPortProtocolDECNet.description: Get this port's total received DECNet protocol packets.

rptrPortProtocolXNS.name: rptrPortProtocolXNS
rptrPortProtocolXNS.description: Get this port's total received XNS protocol packets.

rptrPortProtocolIP.name: rptrPortProtocolIP
rptrPortProtocolIP.description: Get this port's total received TCP/IP protocol packets.

rptrPortProtocolCtron.name: rptrPortProtocolCtron
rptrPortProtocolCtron.description: Get this port's total received CTRON Management protocol packets.

rptrPortProtocolAppletalk.name: rptrPortProtocolAppletalk
rptrPortProtocolAppletalk.description: Get this port's total received Appletalk protocol packets.

rptrPortProtocolOther.name: rptrPortProtocolOther
rptrPortProtocolOther.description: Get this port's total received unknown protocol packets.

rptrPortFrameSzTbl.name: rptrPortFrameSzTbl
rptrPortFrameSzTbl.description: Provides repeater port frame size statistics.

rptrPortFrameSzEntry.name: rptrPortFrameSzEntry
rptrPortFrameSzEntry.description: Describes a set of frame size statistics for a specific port.

rptrPortFrameSzPortId.name: rptrPortFrameSzPortId
rptrPortFrameSzPortId.description: Returns an index to a port for which the information in this table pertains.

rptrPortFrameSzPortGrpId.name: rptrPortFrameSzPortGrpId
rptrPortFrameSzPortGrpId.description: Returns an index to a port group for which the information in this table pertains.

rptrPortFrameSzRunt.name: rptrPortFrameSzRunt
rptrPortFrameSzRunt.description: Get this port's total received packets of size less than 64 bytes.

rptrPortFrameSz64To127.name: rptrPortFrameSz64To127
rptrPortFrameSz64To127.description: Get this port's total received packets of size between 64 and 127 bytes.

rptrPortFrameSz128To255.name: rptrPortFrameSz128To255
rptrPortFrameSz128To255.description: Get this port's total received packets of size between 128 and 255 bytes.

rptrPortFrameSz256To511.name: rptrPortFrameSz256To511
rptrPortFrameSz256To511.description: Get this port's total received packets of size between 256 and 511 bytes.

rptrPortFrameSz512To1023.name: rptrPortFrameSz512To1023
rptrPortFrameSz512To1023.description: Get this port's total received packets of size between 512 and 1023 bytes.

rptrPortFrameSz1024To1518.name: rptrPortFrameSz1024To1518
rptrPortFrameSz1024To1518.description: Get this port's total received packets of size between 1024 and 1518 bytes.

rptrPortFrameSzGiant.name: rptrPortFrameSzGiant
rptrPortFrameSzGiant.description: Get this port's total received packets of size greater than 1518 bytes.

rptrPortAlarmTable.name: rptrPortAlarmTable
rptrPortAlarmTable.description: A list of port alarm objects for this repeater node.

rptrPortAlarmEntry.name: rptrPortAlarmEntry
rptrPortAlarmEntry.description: An entry containing objects pertaining to port alarm objects for a port group.

rptrPortAlarmPortId.name: rptrPortAlarmPortId
rptrPortAlarmPortId.description: Returns an index to a port for which the information in this table pertains.

rptrPortAlarmPortGrpId.name: rptrPortAlarmPortGrpId
rptrPortAlarmPortGrpId.description: Returns an index to a port group for which the information in this table pertains.

rptrPortAlarmTrafEnable.name: rptrPortAlarmTrafEnable
rptrPortAlarmTrafEnable.description: Get returns whether traffic alarms are enabled/disabled. Set allows for enabling/disabling of traffic alarms.

rptrPortAlarmTrafThreshold.name: rptrPortAlarmTrafThreshold
rptrPortAlarmTrafThreshold.description: The maximum number of packets that will be allowed before an alarm is generated.

rptrPortAlarmTrafPortDisable.name: rptrPortAlarmTrafPortDisable
rptrPortAlarmTrafPortDisable.description: Set will permit a port to be disabled on a traffic alarm condition. Get will show whether the port disabling is allowed or not.

rptrPortAlarmCollEnable.name: rptrPortAlarmCollEnable
rptrPortAlarmCollEnable.description: Get returns whether collision alarms are enabled/disabled. Set allows for enabling/disabling of collision alarms.

rptrPortAlarmCollThreshold.name: rptrPortAlarmCollThreshold
rptrPortAlarmCollThreshold.description: The collision threshold is the maximum number of collisions within the time base that will be allowed before an alaram is generated.

rptrPortAlarmCollPortDisable.name: rptrPortAlarmCollPortDisable
rptrPortAlarmCollPortDisable.description: Set will permit a port to be disabled on a collision alarm condition. Get will show whether the port disabling is allowed or not.

rptrPortAlarmErrEnable.name: rptrPortAlarmErrEnable
rptrPortAlarmErrEnable.description: Get returns whether error alarms are enabled/disabled. Set allows for enabling/disabling of error alarms.

rptrPortAlarmErrThreshold.name: rptrPortAlarmErrThreshold
rptrPortAlarmErrThreshold.description: Get/Set the percentage of errors per good packet within the timebase that will cause an alarm.

rptrPortAlarmErrSource.name: rptrPortAlarmErrSource
rptrPortAlarmErrSource.description: Get/Set a bit encoded map of which errors to include in the error sum, as follows: CRC_errors - Bit 0 - Least Significant Bit runts - Bit 1 OOW_colls - Bit 2 align_errs - Bit 3 undefined - Bit 4 Giants - Bit 5

rptrPortAlarmErrPortDisable.name: rptrPortAlarmErrPortDisable
rptrPortAlarmErrPortDisable.description: Set will permit a port to be disabled on an error alarm condition. Get will show whether the port disabling is allowed or not.

rptrPortAlarmBroadEnable.name: rptrPortAlarmBroadEnable
rptrPortAlarmBroadEnable.description: Get returns whether broadcast alarms are enabled/disabled. Set allows for enabling/disabling of broadcast alarms.

rptrPortAlarmBroadThreshold.name: rptrPortAlarmBroadThreshold
rptrPortAlarmBroadThreshold.description: The broadcase threshold represents the maximum number of broadcasts that are allowed during the time base before an alarm is generated.

rptrPortAlarmBroadPortDisable.name: rptrPortAlarmBroadPortDisable
rptrPortAlarmBroadPortDisable.description: Set will permit a port to be disabled on a broadcast alarm condition. Get will show whether the port disabling is allowed or not.

rptrPortRedundTable.name: rptrPortRedundTable
rptrPortRedundTable.description: A list of port redundancy objects for this repeater node.

rptrPortRedundEntry.name: rptrPortRedundEntry
rptrPortRedundEntry.description: An entry containing objects pertaining to port redundancy for a port group.

rptrPortRedundPortId.name: rptrPortRedundPortId
rptrPortRedundPortId.description: Returns an index to a port for which the information in this table pertains.

rptrPortRedundPortGrpId.name: rptrPortRedundPortGrpId
rptrPortRedundPortGrpId.description: Returns an index to a port group for which the information in this table pertains.

rptrPortRedundCrctNum.name: rptrPortRedundCrctNum
rptrPortRedundCrctNum.description: Get/Set redundant circuit number of redundant circuit that port is or is to be associated with.

rptrPortSrcAddrTable.name: rptrPortSrcAddrTable
rptrPortSrcAddrTable.description: A list of port source address objects for this repeater node.

rptrPortSrcAddrEntry.name: rptrPortSrcAddrEntry
rptrPortSrcAddrEntry.description: An entry containing objects pertaining to port source address objects for a port group.

rptrPortSrcAddrPortId.name: rptrPortSrcAddrPortId
rptrPortSrcAddrPortId.description: Returns an index to a port for which the information in this table pertains.

rptrPortSrcAddrPortGrpId.name: rptrPortSrcAddrPortGrpId
rptrPortSrcAddrPortGrpId.description: Returns an index to a port group for which the information in this table pertains.

rptrPortSrcAddrTopoState.name: rptrPortSrcAddrTopoState
rptrPortSrcAddrTopoState.description: Returns the topological state of the port.

rptrPortSrcAddrForceTrunk.name: rptrPortSrcAddrForceTrunk
rptrPortSrcAddrForceTrunk.description: When this object is set to Force it causes the port to be placed into a Trunk topological state whether the network traffic would warrant such a state or not. When this object is set to NoForce it allows the port to assume the topological state it would naturally assume based on the network activity across it. When read this object reports the current setting.

rptrPortSrcAddrActiveUsers.name: rptrPortSrcAddrActiveUsers
rptrPortSrcAddrActiveUsers.description: Returns the total number of active users seen by this port.

rptrPortSrcAddrListTable.name: rptrPortSrcAddrListTable
rptrPortSrcAddrListTable.description: This table provides information about the source addresses that have been seen by the differnt ports.

rptrPortSrcAddrListEntry.name: rptrPortSrcAddrListEntry
rptrPortSrcAddrListEntry.description: A specific source address that has been seen

rptrPortSrcAddrListId.name: rptrPortSrcAddrListId
rptrPortSrcAddrListId.description: Returns an index associated with the number of address to be returned.

rptrPortSrcAddrListPortId.name: rptrPortSrcAddrListPortId
rptrPortSrcAddrListPortId.description: Returns an index to a port for which the information in this table pertains.

rptrPortSrcAddrListPortGrpId.name: rptrPortSrcAddrListPortGrpId
rptrPortSrcAddrListPortGrpId.description: Returns an index to a port group for which the information in this table pertains.

rptrPortSrcAddrAddressList.name: rptrPortSrcAddrAddressList
rptrPortSrcAddrAddressList.description: Returns a source address seen on this port.

rptrPortHardwareTable.name: rptrPortHardwareTable
rptrPortHardwareTable.description: A list of port hardware objects for this repeater port.

rptrPortHardwareEntry.name: rptrPortHardwareEntry
rptrPortHardwareEntry.description: An entry containing objects pertaining to port hardware for a hardware port group.

rptrPortHardwarePortId.name: rptrPortHardwarePortId
rptrPortHardwarePortId.description: Returns an index to a port for which the information in this table pertains.

rptrPortHardwarePortGrpId.name: rptrPortHardwarePortGrpId
rptrPortHardwarePortGrpId.description: Returns an index to a port group for which the information in this table pertains.

rptrPortHwTrapTable.name: rptrPortHwTrapTable
rptrPortHwTrapTable.description: A list of trap enable/disable at the port level.

rptrPortHwTrapEntry.name: rptrPortHwTrapEntry
rptrPortHwTrapEntry.description: Individual trap entries for port group enable/disable.

rptrPortHwTrapSetPortId.name: rptrPortHwTrapSetPortId
rptrPortHwTrapSetPortId.description: Returns an index to a port for which the information in this table pertains.

rptrPortHwTrapSetPortGrpId.name: rptrPortHwTrapSetPortGrpId
rptrPortHwTrapSetPortGrpId.description: Returns an index to a port group for which the information in this table pertains.

rptrPortHwTrapSetLink.name: rptrPortHwTrapSetLink
rptrPortHwTrapSetLink.description: Enables and disables link traps for this port.

rptrPortHwTrapSetSeg.name: rptrPortHwTrapSetSeg
rptrPortHwTrapSetSeg.description: Enables and disables segmentation traps for this port.

rptrPortSaTrapTable.name: rptrPortSaTrapTable
rptrPortSaTrapTable.description: A list of trap enable/disable at the port level

rptrPortSaTrapEntry.name: rptrPortSaTrapEntry
rptrPortSaTrapEntry.description: Individual trap entries for port group enable/disable.

rptrPortSaTrapSetPortId.name: rptrPortSaTrapSetPortId
rptrPortSaTrapSetPortId.description: Returns an index to a port for which the information in this table pertains.

rptrPortSaTrapSetPortGrpId.name: rptrPortSaTrapSetPortGrpId
rptrPortSaTrapSetPortGrpId.description: Returns an index to a port group for which the information in this table pertains.

rptrPortSaTrapSetSrcaddr.name: rptrPortSaTrapSetSrcaddr
rptrPortSaTrapSetSrcaddr.description: Enables and disables source address traps for this port.

rptrPortSecurityTable.name: rptrPortSecurityTable
rptrPortSecurityTable.description: This table defines status of the source lock security.

rptrPortSecurityEntry.name: rptrPortSecurityEntry
rptrPortSecurityEntry.description: Defines lock status for this particular entry.

rptrPortSecurityPortGrpId.name: rptrPortSecurityPortGrpId
rptrPortSecurityPortGrpId.description: The port Group ID for which this source address lock entry pertains.

rptrPortSecurityPortId.name: rptrPortSecurityPortId
rptrPortSecurityPortId.description: The port ID for which this source address lock entry pertains.

rptrPortSecurityLockStatus.name: rptrPortSecurityLockStatus
rptrPortSecurityLockStatus.description: Defines the lock status for this particular port entry.

rptrPortSecurityLockAddAddress.name: rptrPortSecurityLockAddAddress
rptrPortSecurityLockAddAddress.description: Setting a value to this object will cause a new entry to be added to the rptrPortSecurityListTable. When read this object will display an OCTET STRING of SIZE 6 with each octet containing a 0. In general it is possible to add addresses at anytime. However there are several instances where the firmware and or hardware can not support the operation. In these instances an error will be returned if a addition is attempted.

rptrPortSecurityLockDelAddress.name: rptrPortSecurityLockDelAddress
rptrPortSecurityLockDelAddress.description: Setting a value to this object will cause corresponding entry in the rptrPortSecurityListTable to be deleted. When read this object returns an OCTET STRING of length 6 with each octet having the value '0'. In general it is possible to delete locked addresses at any time. however there are instances where it is not supported in which case an error will be returned.

rptrPortSecurityDisableOnViolation.name: rptrPortSecurityDisableOnViolation
rptrPortSecurityDisableOnViolation.description: Designates whether port is disabled if its source address is violated. A source address violation occurs when a address is detected which is not in the source address list for this port. If the port is disabled due to the source address violation it can be enabled by setting rptrPortMgmtAdminState.

rptrPortSecurityFullSecEnabled.name: rptrPortSecurityFullSecEnabled
rptrPortSecurityFullSecEnabled.description: A port that is set to full security and is locked will scramble ALL packets, which are not contained in the expected address list, including broadcasts and multicasts. A port that is set to partial security will allow broadcasts and multicasts to repeat unscrambled.

rptrPortSecuritySecureState.name: rptrPortSecuritySecureState
rptrPortSecuritySecureState.description: The secure state of the port. If the port is secure(1), it can be locked in order to enable security. A nonSecure(2) port cannot be locked.

rptrPortSecurityForceNonSecure.name: rptrPortSecurityForceNonSecure
rptrPortSecurityForceNonSecure.description: The force non-secure state of port. If the port is Forced, Non-Secure via a value of forceNonSecure(2), it is put into a Non-Secure state, in which case it cannot be locked. If a port is not forced noForce(1), then it will take on its natural state, according to the traffic flow on the port.

rptrPortSecurityLearnState.name: rptrPortSecurityLearnState
rptrPortSecurityLearnState.description: The learn state of the port. This object will only be applied to a port that is unlocked. If set to learn(1), all addresses are deleted on the port and learning begins once again. If it is set to noLearn(2), learning stops on the port.

rptrPortSecurityLearnMode.name: rptrPortSecurityLearnMode
rptrPortSecurityLearnMode.description: The learn mode of the port. If set to oneTime(1), the port is capable of learning two addresses and securing on both destination and source addresses (upon locking port). If set to continuous(2), all addresses are initially deleted and the port continuously replaces the existing secure source address with the latest source address it sees.

rptrPortSecurityListTable.name: rptrPortSecurityListTable
rptrPortSecurityListTable.description: This table defines a list of all source address locks maintained for the specified port.

rptrPortSecurityListEntry.name: rptrPortSecurityListEntry
rptrPortSecurityListEntry.description: An entry containing objects pertaining to source address locks for a port group.

rptrPortSecurityListPortGrpId.name: rptrPortSecurityListPortGrpId
rptrPortSecurityListPortGrpId.description: The port group for which this security list entry pertains.

rptrPortSecurityListPortId.name: rptrPortSecurityListPortId
rptrPortSecurityListPortId.description: The port ID for which this source address lock list pertains.

rptrPortSecurityListIndex.name: rptrPortSecurityListIndex
rptrPortSecurityListIndex.description: A unique index for the source address entries.

rptrPortSecurityListAddress.name: rptrPortSecurityListAddress
rptrPortSecurityListAddress.description: Defines the particular source address that has been locked.

rptrPortAssocTable.name: rptrPortAssocTable
rptrPortAssocTable.description: This table defines the port association for those switching MIMs that support this functionality.

rptrPortAssocEntry.name: rptrPortAssocEntry
rptrPortAssocEntry.description: Describes a particular port association entry.

rptrPortAssocBoard.name: rptrPortAssocBoard
rptrPortAssocBoard.description: The board number for which this port association information pertains.

rptrPortAssocStatus.name: rptrPortAssocStatus
rptrPortAssocStatus.description: This object describes the status of the user selectable port. On a TPXMIM34 this is port 13 which may either be an EPIM or default configuration. A value of defaultPort(1) restores the default configuration. A value of otherPort(2) may imply the use of the EPIM connection.
